title: FTP Hidden Treasure
description: Explore the FTP server for hidden files and discover the treasure.
hints: Try logging in with the provided credentials.
Ensure to explore all directories on the server.
Look for files that seem out of place or hidden.
learningObjectives: Learn to use FTP clients for directory exploration.
Understand the implications of improper FTP permission configurations.
Develop skills to look for hidden or unusual files.
